mapper.select: SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE GOODS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY GOODS_NUM DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE A.CATEGORY_NUM = #{CATEGORY_NUM} ORDER BY A.GOODS_HITCOUNT DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, AVG(C.REVIEW_GRADE) AS GRADE FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, REVIEW C WHERE A.CATEGORY_NUM = #{CATEGORY_NUM} AND A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.GOODS_NUM = C.GOODS_NUM GROUP BY A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 ORDER BY GRADE DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET GOODS_HITCOUNT+1 WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NUM FROM ORDERS WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{MEMBER_NUM} AND GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM} ORDER BY REVIEW_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS( ORDER_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, MEMBER_NUM, GOODS_NUM, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_ECHECK ) VALUES ( ORDER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ORDER_AMOUNT}, #{MEMBER_NUM}, #{GOODS_NUM}, #{ORDER_DATE}, #{ORDER_PRICE}, #{ORDER_PAYMENT}, #{ORDER_ECHECK} )
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NUM, O.ORDER_DATE, G.GOODS_NAME, O.ORDER_AMOUNT, O.ORDER_PRICE, O.ORDER_PAYMENT FROM GOODS G, ORDERS O WHERE O.MEMBER_NUM = #{MEMBER_NUM} AND G.GOODS_NUM = O.GOODS_NUM

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, B.GOODS_IMG2, B.GOODS_IMG3 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM} AND A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM AND C.BIG_CATEGORY = #{BIG_CATEGORY}

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM AND C.BIG_CATEGORY = #{SMALL_CATEGORY}

SELECT GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_DCPRICE, GOODS_IMG1, GOODS_HITCOUNT FROM( SELECT A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, B.GOODS_IMG1, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM ORDER BY A.GOODS_HITCOUNT DESC )WHERE ROWNUM <6

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE A.GOODS_NUM=B.GOODS_NUM AND A.GOODS_PRICE > A.GOODS_DCPRICE ORDER BY A.GOODS_DCPRICE DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B WHERE A.GOODS_NUM=B.GOODS_NUM AND A.GOODS_PRICE > A.GOODS_DCPRICE ORDER BY A.CATEGORY_NUM DESC
